mapper.sql: org_id, org_cn_name, org_cn_short, org_nickname, org_en_name, org_map_entity, fund_info, invest_info
mapper.select: select * from pm_org_info where org_cn_name like concat('%',#{0},'%') limit #{1},10
mapper.insert: insert into pm_org_info (org_id, org_cn_name, org_cn_short, org_nickname, org_en_name, org_map_entity, fund_info, invest_info, org_cn_desc ) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCnShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgMapEntity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCnDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update pm_org_info
org_cn_name = #{orgCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
